languages.text: "Впрочем, вы этого не увидите, Ваша Светлость. Я прикажу К'тан уничтожить ваш труп настолько тщательно, чтобы от вас не осталось и следа даже на самом фундаментальном уровне мироздания. Как бы это ни было для вас печально, но для таких, как вы, в создаваемом мной будущем нет места".

"However, you will not be there to see it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will have the C'tan Shard destroy your body so thoroughly that there won't be the slightest trace left of you. You may find it lamentable, but there is simply no place for the likes of you in the future that I am creating."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, вы этого не увидите, Ваша Светлость. Я прикажу К'тан уничтожить ваш труп настолько тщательно, чтобы от вас не осталось и следа даже на самом фундаментальном уровне мироздания. Как бы это ни было для вас печально, но для таких, как вы, в создаваемом мной будущем нет места".

traits.locale_text: "You will not see it either way, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will order C'Tan to destroy your body so thoroughly, that there won't be a trace of you even on the most fundamental level of the universe. It may be regrettable for you, but there is no places for the likes of you in the future that I am creating."

"You will not see it either way, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will order C'Tan to destroy your body so thoroughly, that there won't be a trace of you even on the most fundamental level of the universe. It may be regrettable for you, but there is no places for the likes of you in the future that I am creating."

"You will not see it either way, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will order the C'Tan to destroy your body so thoroughly, there won't be a trace left of you even on the most fundamental level of the universe. It may be regrettable for you, but there is no place for the likes of you in the future that I am forging."

"You will not see it either way, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will order the C'Tan to destroy your body so thoroughly, there won't be a trace left of you even on the most fundamental level of the universe. It may be regrettable for you, but there is no place for the likes of you in the future that I am forging."

"However, you will not be there to see it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will have the C'tan destroy your body so thoroughly that there won't be a trace left of you even on the most fundamental level of existence. You may find it lamentable, but there is simply no place for the likes of you in the future that I am creating."

"However, you will not be there to see it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will have the C'tan Shard destroy your body so thoroughly that there won't be the slightest trace left of you. You may find it lamentable, but there is simply no place for the likes of you in the future that I am creating."

languages.text: « Cependant, vous ne serez pas là pour le voir, Votre Seigneurie. J'ordonnerai à l'Écharde C'tan de détruire votre corps si soigneusement qu'il ne restera aucune trace de vous. J'imagine que vous trouvez cette perspective navrante, mais il n'y a tout simplement pas de place pour les individus tels que vous dans l'avenir que je bâtis. »
languages.original_text: "However, you will not be there to see it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will have the C'tan Shard destroy your body so thoroughly that there won't be the slightest trace left of you. You may find it lamentable, but there is simply no place for the likes of you in the future that I am creating."

traits.locale_text: « Cependant, vous ne serez pas là pour le voir, Votre Seigneurie. J'ordonnerai au C'tan de détruire votre corps si soigneusement qu'il ne restera aucune trace de vous, même au niveau le plus fondamental de l'existence. C'est sûrement regrettable pour vous, mais il n'y a pas de place pour les individus tels que vous dans l'avenir que je bâtis. »

languages.text: «Sin embargo, no estará ahí para verlo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Haré que el fragmento de C'tan destruya su cuerpo con tanto esmero que no quede ni el más leve rastro de su existencia. Tal vez le resulte trágico, pero no hay ningún lugar para gente como usted en el futuro que estoy creando».
languages.original_text: "However, you will not be there to see it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will have the C'tan Shard destroy your body so thoroughly that there won't be the slightest trace left of you. You may find it lamentable, but there is simply no place for the likes of you in the future that I am creating."

traits.locale_text: «En cualquier caso, mi{mf|lord|lady}, me temo que no llegará a verlo. Ordenaré al C'Tan que destruya su cuerpo con tanta saña como para no dejar ni un solo átomo de su ser en todo el universo. Una lástima para usted, pero no, los de su calaña no tienen cabida en el futuro que estoy creando».

languages.text: “不过，你恐怕是看不到那一幕了，大人。我会命令星神碎片彻底摧毁你的肉体，彻底抹消你的一切痕迹。或许你会感到遗憾，但在我准备创造的未来之中，像你这样的人没有容身之地。”
languages.original_text: "However, you will not be there to see it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will have the C'tan Shard destroy your body so thoroughly that there won't be the slightest trace left of you. You may find it lamentable, but there is simply no place for the likes of you in the future that I am creating."

traits.locale_text: “不过，无论如何，你恐怕是看不到那一幕了，大人。我会命令星神彻底摧毁你的肉体，从整个宇宙最基本的层面上，彻底抹消你的一切痕迹。或许你会感到遗憾，但在我一手创造的未来之中，像你这样的人是没有容身之地的。”

languages.text: "Aber Ihr werdet es nicht mehr miterleben, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich lasse das C'tan-Fragment Euren Körper derart gründlich zerstören, dass nicht die geringste Spur mehr von Euch übrig sein wird. Ihr mögt das bedauerlich finden, doch in der Zukunft, die ich erschaffe, ist für Euresgleichen schlicht kein Platz."
languages.original_text: "However, you will not be there to see it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will have the C'tan Shard destroy your body so thoroughly that there won't be the slightest trace left of you. You may find it lamentable, but there is simply no place for the likes of you in the future that I am creating."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet es nicht zu sehen bekommen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich werde dem C'tan befehlen, Euren Körper so gründlich zu zerstören, dass nicht einmal auf fundamentalster Ebene des Universums noch eine winzige Spur von Euch übrigbleibt. Für Euch mag das bedauerlich sein, doch in der Zukunft, die ich schmiede, ist kein Platz für Euresgleichen."

languages.text: 「いずれにせよ、あなたがそれを見ることはないだろう、閣下。私はク＝タン・シャードに命じてあなたの肉体を徹底的に破壊し、宇宙の最も根源的なレベルにおいてさえ、あなたの痕跡は残らないようにしよう。あなたにとっては残念なことかもしれないが、私が作る未来にあなたのような者の居場所はないのだよ」
languages.original_text: "However, you will not be there to see it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will have the C'tan Shard destroy your body so thoroughly that there won't be the slightest trace left of you. You may find it lamentable, but there is simply no place for the likes of you in the future that I am creating."

traits.locale_text: 「いずれにせよ、あなたには見えまい。私はク＝タンに命じてあなたの肉体を徹底的に破壊し、宇宙の最も根源的なレベルにおいてさえ、あなたの痕跡は残らないようにしよう。あなたにとっては残念なことかもしれないが、私が作る未来にあなたのような者の居場所はないのだよ」

languages.text: "Fakat sen bunu göremeyeceksin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. C'tan Parçası, bedeninizi öyle bir yok edecek ki geriye hiçbir şey kalmayacak. Buna üzülebilirsin ama yarattığım gelecekte senin gibilere yer yok."
languages.original_text: "However, you will not be there to see it, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I will have the C'tan Shard destroy your body so thoroughly that there won't be the slightest trace left of you. You may find it lamentable, but there is simply no place for the likes of you in the future that I am creating."
